title: Is there anyway to record a custom game?
body: I am trying to get a replay of a custom game and I couldn't find any method to do so. Riot match history doesn't seem to record custom games.

replies.body:
Ayyyyyy wonder what game you could be trying to record xD!

You should be able to find that replay in your Profile under Match History. It should be close to the stop (since I'm assuming you're downloading the game we played xP) and you can download it by clicking the button over on the right-hand side of the Match Line.

https://i.gyazo.com/cf53371a6f302cedcd7ee955b03e8872.png

Thanks for the comment (sorry that this replay is late) I figured out that you have to **win/lose** a custom game for it to be recorded instead of leaving it halfway. Thanks for the help though!
I was making a cinematic with a friend of mine on the custom game : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lWGx94eNHKk
